name: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter

reviews: Thank you Andrea for making me realise I was in a toxic relationship with this game
This game has my whole childhood inside it. well played Croateam, you still have me as your #1 fan.
is the best game ever seen

serious sam hd: the first encounter is pure chaos in the best way. it's an old school shooter with no reloading, no cover system, just you, a bunch of crazy weapons, and hundreds of enemies charging at you. the game never takes itself too seriously, and that’s what makes it fun. it’s fast, dumb, and super satisfying. every level is a huge open space packed with secrets and non-stop action. the soundtrack fits the madness perfectly. if you like running backwards while shooting at screaming headless guys, this is your game. it’s simple, it’s intense, and it never slows down. highly recommended.

short_description: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter is a visually upgraded and fully Steam supported remake version of the original high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS which was Gamespot's Game of the Year 2001 and which scored overall of 87% on Metacritic!
